name: Playdate Bunny Bundle
description:
Here’s a small, free "companion" app made in Pulp for the Playdate Bunny Bundle from March 24th  to April 21st. You get the app and the digital magazine. Both are free, but if you wish to make a donation to adopt a bunny, you absolutely can. As of April 10th, 2023, five bunnies have been adopted, and the sixth bunny is 15% towards its goal.

You’re probably asking...

View the games

See the 14 games in the bundle with a description. If the game has a bunny, the hint will be displayed on the page, and you can walk over to it.

Snatchy Carrots

A minigame made by XaniaLasagna. Collect as many carrots as you can before the timer runs out. If people love the game, it may become a full game. How many carrots can you get? Post your score using #BBSnatchyCarrots.

#PDbunnyCake

If someone can find all the bunnies in the games, take a screenshot of each bunny and post it with the hashtag #PDbunnycake to win a cake. Isn’t this rabbit adorable, and doesn't the pixel cake look good too? Note: Please do not eat or lick your Playdate.
